spell.name: False Life
spell.components: V, S, M (a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits)
spell.shortDescription: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points for the duration. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you gain 5 additional temporary hit points for each slot level above 1st.
